column5: Just ran across the 1993 In Fisherman Walleye Guide in my pile of fishing information. Made me realize how little has actually changed in walleye fishing. The walleye have not changed, but we are still in search of the perfect "whatever" to catch them. This would be a good read for anyone looking for timeless information. Plus it is still interesting to me.Pooch
Yep, the Walleye needs to have a open mouth and you need a sharp hook, beyond that it's marketing isn't it.
